findings.title: LogAllow event missing parameter
findings.description: The LowAllog event is currently not logging anything.

findings.title: Uint256 can be used in replacement of uint8 to save gas
findings.description: Using uint256 instead of uint8 on line #L47 can cost less gas.

findings.title: Repeated if statement can be replaced by modifier
findings.description: Same if statement appears three times in different functions. Suggest to use a modifier to replace repeated codes

findings.title: No Fixed Supply
findings.description: The totalSupply of BKT tokens can increase indefinitely if the owner does not call finishMinting(), resulting in no fixed supply.

findings.title: Token Distribution Script
findings.description: The Python script `companycoin.py` used for token distribution may need adaptation to support multiple addresses and token values, and floating points should be avoided to prevent unexpected results.
